front.title: Using XMPP Protocol and its Extensions for Use with IODEF

abstract.t: This document describes how the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) [RFC7590] can be used as the framework as transport protocol for collecting and distributing any security telemetry information between any network connected device. As an example, this document describes how XMPP can be used to transport the Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) information.
